task.title: Analytics
task.shortdesc: The Square POS app offerrs business owners analytics with real-time data, customer insignts and reports all on the go.

step.cmd: Log in or create an acount at to be redirected to the Square Dashboard.
Click or Tap the three horizantal bars next to "Home" to open the Square Dashboard sidebar menu.
Next, Click or Tap the Reports icon in the upper part of the sidebar menu to be redirected to Analytics Report page.
To view the Sales Summary click "Sales Summary".

substep.cmd: In Sales Summary, Square users can hover over the intercative graph to get a detailed sale summary of orders.
Square users can also filter sales by date, day, device, and source.
To see detailed sales trends in interactive graphs, click the link "See more sales trends".
